üñº **NFT Stickers** **are coming** 

@sticker_bot is integrating a new API for the recently published [standard](https://docs.ton.org/v3/documentation/dapps/assets/nft-2.0) by TON Foundation. 

Like Gifts, our Stickers** **will have both powers:

‚úàÔ∏è **Telegram (off-chain)** ‚Äì smooth for transfers, simple for non-crypto users

üíé **TON (on-chain) **‚Äì real NFTs on your wallet, tradable across NFT marketplaces**

**Community will decide where they want to hold and trade their BAYC or Pudgy Penguin stickers on TON or Telegram, our goal is to make it simple for both worlds.

We believe in TON Foundation's efforts to make this standard supported by Telegram, so we are happy to be the pioneers.

__Note: NFT 2.0 __[__documentation__](https://docs.ton.org/v3/documentation/dapps/assets/nft-2.0)__ was released just 2 days ago, and since the new approach has not yet been publicly tested by TF, **we will take the time** to ensure that it works well, so that you won't have any trouble with it.__ __
__**
**üñº

**Stickers: when the entire crypto community turns to Telegram and TON**

About a half year ago we've introduced a way to launch unique Stickers with fixed supply, so Telegram users can actually own it.

This approach turned up to be a huge success that attracted real OGs:
üêß Pudgy Penguins
ü¶ç Bored Apes
‚õ©Ô∏è Azuki
üåà Doodles
üêµ Chimpers
ü¶â Moonbirds
ü¶≠ Sappy Seals 
**with** **overall 34 collections of 152 packs!**

Most of these communities started with Stickers, but now they have channels, apps, private groups, and consider Telegram for one of their main platforms ‚ù§Ô∏è

More stats:
üî• **110,000 holders** now own at least one pack
üî• **$8.4M** in volume across all open marketplaces
üî• **$124,000** worth of stickers **burned** by the community - for fun (or glory)

In addition, we decided to make it open to independent marketplaces, developers, and communities, which gave a life for the whole ecosystem:
‚Üí [Marketplaces](https://t.me/sticker_bot?startapp=act_markets)
‚Üí [Access app](http://t.me/access_app_bot)
‚Üí [Dune Dashboard](https://dune.com/telegram/stickers)
‚Üí [Analytics tools](https://stickers.tools/)
‚Üí [Sticker burner](https://t.me/stickerburn)
‚Üí [Not Cap App](https://t.me/notcapclub_bot)
‚Üí and other tools, holder chats and apps

That's how the narrative was born, and we all took part in it üíõ
Now we are happy to see a number of popular artists and brands that want to launch their Stickers and Gifts on Telegram üëè

__Feel free to share what we all have achieved and let's push it further!__

–ò–∑ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–º–µ—Ç–∏–ª –¥–ª—è —Å–µ–±—è:

Not all transfers require royalties

- Gifting to a friend? No royalty
- Moving NFTs between your own wallets? No royalty

Royalties only kick-in when there‚Äôs commercial intent:
Sales, auctions, DeFi integrations, etc.
